entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few showers or drizzle. High 12 except 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 12 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016
